sentences.english: Weibian has vast iron inkstone wear, kousong notes that year hand.

sentences.english: Together, it is the most award-winning combined antivirus and antispyware on the market today.
sentences.chinese: 一起，這是最屢獲殊榮的市場整合防毒和反間諜今天。

sentences.english: As with other commodities, the wheat market has seen some of its highest prices in recent times.
sentences.chinese: 近期，小麥價格如同其他初級產品價格一樣屢創新高。

sentences.english: You tend to be flamboyant and melodramatic when it comes to matters of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 你往往被華麗和屢有發生，當談到事項的心臟。
